Comment: Jointly with the Committee on Civil Service and Labor

Items.Title: Oversight - Paid Parental Leave for New York City Municipal Employees.
Items.ActionText: This Oversight was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Oversight - Paid Parental Leave for New York City Municipal Employees.

Items.Title: Jointly with the Committee on Civil Service and Labor
Resolution calling upon New York City to extend paid family leave benefits to city employees covered by municipal unions
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Extend paid family leave benefits to city employees covered by municipal unions.

Items.Title: Resolution calling upon the New York State Legislature to pass, and the Governor to sign, legislation to amend the state Paid Family Leave Act to provide workers in New York State with a benefit equal to 100 percent of an employee’s average weekly wage.
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Amend the state Paid Family Leave Act.

Items.Title: Oversight - Paid Parental Leave for New York City Municipal Employees.
Items.ActionText: This Oversight was Filed, by Committee
Items.MatterName: Oversight - Paid Parental Leave for New York City Municipal Employees.

Items.Title: Resolution calling upon New York City to extend paid family leave benefits to city employees covered by municipal unions
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Laid Over by Committee
Items.MatterName: Extend paid family leave benefits to city employees covered by municipal unions.

Items.Title: Resolution calling upon the New York State Legislature to pass, and the Governor to sign, legislation to amend the state Paid Family Leave Act to provide workers in New York State with a benefit equal to 100 percent of an employee’s average weekly wage.
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Laid Over by Committee
Items.MatterName: Amend the state Paid Family Leave Act.

Items.MinutesNote: Other Council Members Attending: Williams, Adams and Maisel
